title: Kantai Collection – Kankore – Kakuyoku no Kizuna - Novel Updates
author: Uchida Hiroki   内田 弘樹
description:
“Why have I become a human girl...?”

Having supposed to have sank after a desperate battle, Aircraft Carrier Zuikaku opens her eyes to discover that she has become one of the young girls known as, “Shipgirls.”

Having become one of the, “shipgirls,” possessed with the powers and memories of the War of the Past, Zuikaku and her elder sister Shoukaku reunite, and through the man known as, “The Admiral,” come to terms with the existence of humanity’s enemy–the Abyssal Ships. She resolves to protect this world that is so similar to that of her memories and embarks once more onto the battlefield–and must experience and confront the implications of her own cruel fate.

From the point of view of the, “Lucky Carrier,” Zuikaku and located in the world of the super-popular webgame, “Kantai Collection,” this novel novel hereby launches!
>
